name: commandlinestarwarssearchapp
description: 1. Open up your favorite terminal and run ```npm install```.      - This command will by default look for a local package.json file to install packages from its list of **dependencies**.  2. Make a text file called ```star_wars_characters```. 3. Execute [app.js](app.js) in its current directory like the following:      - ```node app.js [search-keyword | leaderboard]```     - Examples:         - ```node app.js yoda```         - ```node app.js luke```         - ```node app.js leaderboard```             - converts all records of star_wars_characters.csv into an array of objects.  The array is then displayed as a table by the following line of code:                 ```javascript                  console.table(leaderboard);                 ```
